They will now be net sellers as AAPL and others gain in relative value again. This scam is coming to an end and it will be ugly.

Message.Title: Amazon fighting NYS on taxes...
Message.Msg: I hope that NYS #$%$ slaps Amazon. NYS Retirement fund divest money from funds supporting this scam and trying to evade taxes while simultaneously planning for same day delivery of groceries to NYC... But, it won't be doing business in the state. It's time for the states to beat the #$%$ out of Amazon... Once one does, all of its "deals" to build out infrastructure are gone...

Topic.Title: Shorts Now Giving It Back

Message.Msg: You could be right algaebb. I am thinking the strikes will be a minor deal. Fire a few missiles and that's it. That said I doubt the correction is fully over. The tapering should start soon given the revised GDP to 2.5% and continued lower jobless claims. Hopefully the FED realizes they eventually have to end this program so get it started. I still think a major correction could still be on the way but we'll see.

Topic.Title: Are You Ready for a Federal Online Shopping Tax?

Message.Msg: Amazon wants that bill to pass. It's been lobbying heavily in Washington D.C. for its passage for years now. Once the Federal Online Sales Tax is passed, smaller e-tailers won't have any advantage over Amazon anymore. Bwahahahaha . . . .

Topic.Title: Another Thurs aft where AMZM closes at the max pain in order to set Fri opex kill

Message.Msg: Tech - the technicals have already flipped (2 weeks ago) and the S&P is headed for a more than 10% correction. It is typical in the 1st two weeks of the model switch for lots of up and down turbulance as VIX rises (up 30% since Aug start). I think once the volume returns post Labor day (next week), the "risk on" bubble will burst ... NFLX, AMZN, CRM, LNKD, TSLA will all have big drops (through Oct) .. 20-50% type drops.
